content: उपमितिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Resemblance, comparison, similarity; पल्लवोपमितिसाम्यसपक्षं <ls>S. D.</ls>; तदाननस्योपमितौ दरिद्रता <ls>N. 1. 24.</ls> {@--2@} (In Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab>) Analogy, inference, deduction, knowledge of things derived from analogy, a conclusion deduced by means of an उपमान; प्रत्यक्षमप्यनुमितिस्तथोपमितिशब्दजे <ls>Bhāṣā P. 52.</ls> {@--3@} A figure of speech = उपमा <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} A likeness, picture.
